panels.description: NOTE: using rules metrics, and % values are "current use" as a % of cpu

targets.expr: sum by (pod,container) (kube_pod_container_resource_requests{job="kube-state-metrics", resource="cpu", namespace=~"$namespace", pod=~"$pod", container=~"$container", container!="POD"})
sum by (pod,container) (kube_pod_container_resource_limits{job="kube-state-metrics", resource="cpu", namespace=~"$namespace", pod=~"$pod", container=~"$container", container!="POD"})
(max_over_time(node_namespace_pod_container:container_cpu_usage_seconds_total:sum_rate{namespace=~"$namespace", pod=~"$pod", container=~"$container"}[$__range]))
(avg_over_time(node_namespace_pod_container:container_cpu_usage_seconds_total:sum_rate{namespace=~"$namespace", pod=~"$pod", container=~"$container"}[$__range]))
sum by (pod,container) (irate(container_cpu_usage_seconds_total{job="kubelet", namespace=~"$namespace", pod=~"$pod", container=~"$container", container!="POD", image!=""}[4m]))

sum by (pod,container) (irate(container_cpu_usage_seconds_total{job="kubelet", namespace=~"$namespace", pod=~"$pod", container=~"$container", container!="POD", image!=""}[4m])) / sum by (pod,container) (kube_pod_container_resource_requests{job="kube-state-metrics", resource="cpu", namespace=~"$namespace", pod=~"$pod", container=~"$container", container!="POD"})

sum by (pod,container) (irate(container_cpu_usage_seconds_total{job="kubelet", namespace=~"$namespace", pod=~"$pod", container=~"$container", container!="POD", image!=""}[4m])) / sum by (pod,container) (kube_pod_container_resource_limits{job="kube-state-metrics", resource="cpu", namespace=~"$namespace", pod=~"$pod", container=~"$container", container!="POD"})

panels.title: CPU Use

panels.description: NOTE: using rules metrics, and % values are "current use" as a % of mem

targets.expr: sum by (pod,container) (kube_pod_container_resource_requests{job="kube-state-metrics", resource="memory", namespace=~"$namespace", pod=~"$pod", container=~"$container", container!="POD"})
sum by (pod,container) (kube_pod_container_resource_limits{job="kube-state-metrics", resource="memory", namespace=~"$namespace", pod=~"$pod", container=~"$container", container!="POD"})
(max_over_time(node_namespace_pod_container:container_memory_working_set_bytes{namespace=~"$namespace", pod=~"$pod", container=~"$container", container!="POD"}[$__range]))
(max_over_time(node_namespace_pod_container:container_memory_cache{namespace=~"$namespace", pod=~"$pod", container=~"$container", container!="POD"}[$__range]))
(avg_over_time(node_namespace_pod_container:container_memory_working_set_bytes{namespace=~"$namespace", pod=~"$pod", container=~"$container", container!="POD"}[$__range]))
(avg_over_time(node_namespace_pod_container:container_memory_cache{namespace=~"$namespace", pod=~"$pod", container=~"$container", container!="POD"}[$__range]))
sum by (pod,container) (container_memory_usage_bytes{job="kubelet", namespace=~"$namespace", pod=~"$pod", container=~"$container", container!="POD", image!=""})

sum by (pod,container) (container_memory_usage_bytes{job="kubelet", namespace=~"$namespace", pod=~"$pod", container=~"$container", container!="POD", image!=""}) / sum by (pod,container) (kube_pod_container_resource_requests{job="kube-state-metrics", resource="memory", namespace=~"$namespace", pod=~"$pod", container=~"$container", container!="POD"})

sum by (pod,container) (container_memory_usage_bytes{job="kubelet", namespace=~"$namespace", pod=~"$pod", container=~"$container", container!="POD", image!=""}) / sum by (pod,container) (kube_pod_container_resource_limits{job="kube-state-metrics", resource="memory", namespace=~"$namespace", pod=~"$pod", container=~"$container", container!="POD"})

panels.title: Memory Use  (bytes)

targets.expr: sum  (irate(container_cpu_usage_seconds_total{job="kubelet", namespace=~"$namespace", container!="POD", image!=""}[4m]))
sum  (kube_pod_container_resource_requests{job="kube-state-metrics", resource="cpu", namespace=~"$namespace"})
sum  (kube_pod_container_resource_limits{job="kube-state-metrics", resource="cpu", namespace=~"$namespace"})
sum  (container_memory_usage_bytes{job="kubelet", namespace=~"$namespace", container!="POD"})
sum  (kube_pod_container_resource_requests{job="kube-state-metrics", resource="memory", namespace=~"$namespace"})
sum  (kube_pod_container_resource_limits{job="kube-state-metrics", resource="memory", namespace=~"$namespace"})
sum  (container_memory_cache{job="kubelet", namespace=~"$namespace", container!="POD"})
sum by(pod,container) (irate(container_cpu_usage_seconds_total{job="kubelet", namespace=~"$namespace", pod=~"$pod", container=~"$container", container!="POD", image!=""}[4m]))
sum by(pod,container) (kube_pod_container_resource_requests{job="kube-state-metrics", resource="cpu", namespace=~"$namespace", pod=~"$pod", container=~"$container"})
sum by(pod,container) (container_memory_usage_bytes{job="kubelet", namespace=~"$namespace", pod=~"$pod", container=~"$container", container!="POD"})
sum by(pod,container) (kube_pod_container_resource_requests{job="kube-state-metrics", resource="memory", namespace=~"$namespace", pod=~"$pod", container=~"$container"                  })

panels.description:
100% (consider increasing req)
0% (sized just right)
-100% (consider decreasing req)

targets.expr: ( 100 * (sum by(pod,container) (irate(container_cpu_usage_seconds_total{job="kubelet", namespace=~"$namespace", pod=~"$pod", container=~"$container", container!="POD", image!=""}[4m])) / sum by(pod,container) (kube_pod_container_resource_requests{job="kube-state-metrics", resource="cpu", namespace=~"$namespace", pod=~"$pod", container=~"$container"}) ))

panels.title: % CPU use / req

targets.expr: ( 100 * (sum by(pod,container) (container_memory_usage_bytes{job="kubelet", namespace=~"$namespace", pod=~"$pod", container=~"$container", container!="POD"}) / sum by(pod,container) (kube_pod_container_resource_requests{job="kube-state-metrics", resource="memory", namespace=~"$namespace", pod=~"$pod", container=~"$container" }) ))

panels.description:
100% (consider increasing req)
0% (sized just right)
-100% (consider decreasing req)

targets.expr: ( 100 * (sum by(pod,container) (irate(container_cpu_usage_seconds_total{job="kubelet", namespace=~"$namespace", pod=~"$pod", container=~"$container", container!="POD", image!=""}[4m])) / sum by(pod,container) (kube_pod_container_resource_limits{job="kube-state-metrics", resource="cpu", namespace=~"$namespace", pod=~"$pod", container=~"$container"}) ))

panels.title: % CPU use / lim

targets.expr: ( 100 * (sum by(pod,container) (container_memory_usage_bytes{job="kubelet", namespace=~"$namespace", pod=~"$pod", container=~"$container", container!="POD"}) / sum by(pod,container) (kube_pod_container_resource_limits{job="kube-state-metrics", resource="memory", namespace=~"$namespace", pod=~"$pod", container=~"$container" }) ))
sum by(pod,container) (irate(container_cpu_usage_seconds_total{job="kubelet", namespace=~"$namespace", pod=~"$pod", container=~"$container", container!="POD", image!=""}[4m]))
sum by(pod,container) (kube_pod_container_resource_requests{job="kube-state-metrics", resource="cpu", namespace=~"$namespace", pod=~"$pod", container=~"$container"})
sum by(pod,container) (kube_pod_container_resource_limits{job="kube-state-metrics", resource="cpu", namespace=~"$namespace", pod=~"$pod", container=~"$container"})
sum by(pod,container) (container_memory_usage_bytes{job="kubelet", namespace=~"$namespace", pod=~"$pod", container=~"$container", container!="POD"})
sum by(pod,container) (kube_pod_container_resource_requests{job="kube-state-metrics", resource="memory", namespace=~"$namespace", pod=~"$pod", container=~"$container"                  })
sum by(pod,container) (kube_pod_container_resource_limits{job="kube-state-metrics", resource="memory", namespace=~"$namespace", pod=~"$pod", container=~"$container"                  })
sum by(pod,container) (container_memory_cache{job="kubelet", namespace=~"$namespace", pod=~"$pod", container=~"$container", container!="POD"})
sort_desc(sum by (pod) (irate(container_network_receive_bytes_total{job="kubelet", namespace=~"$namespace", pod=~"$pod"}[4m])))
sort_desc(sum by (pod) (irate(container_network_transmit_bytes_total{job="kubelet", namespace=~"$namespace", pod=~"$pod"}[4m])))
max by (pod,container) (kube_pod_container_status_restarts_total{job="kube-state-metrics", namespace=~"$namespace", pod=~"$pod", container=~"$container"})
process_open_fds{namespace=~"$namespace", pod=~"$pod"}
sum by(deployment) (kube_deployment_status_replicas_available{namespace=~"$namespace", deployment=~"$pod"})
sum by(hpa) (kube_hpa_status_current_replicas{namespace=~"$namespace"})
process_open_fds{namespace=~"$namespace", pod=~"$pod"}
